participant_1.name: Megan
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, loves to have fun and enjoy life.
participant_1.background: my favorite movie is mean girls. i'm a party animal. i am deathly afraid of heights. i help out at the food bank occasionally. i own a cat and a dog.

participant_2.background: i visit europe twice a year. i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i love to cook paella. i've a weakness for fish and chips. i am an art major in college.
